trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Rhome
There were no other sightings in Rhome on or around September 10th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsthought they were stars and then one lit up llike a hilicopter then lit up 8 lights in a circular shape their was three of them heading north east comming from the south we were on the rhome 287 exit comming from decatur tx i hope yall dont think i am crazy my mom and daughter were both with me in the truckand they were in a pack appearing and disapearing it was amazing
Summary: thought they were stars and then one lit up llike a hilicopter then lit up 8 lights in a circular shape
